alert.note: Alert for Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; Northern Monterey Bay; San Francisco; San Fransisco Peninsula Coast; Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued December 30 at 1:38PM PST until December 30 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING HAS EXPIRED... ...HIGH SURF WARNING REPLACED BY HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Large breaking waves of 16 to 19 feet. * WHERE...San Francisco, Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore, San Francisco Peninsula Coast, Northern Monterey Bay and Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Dangerous swimming and surfing conditions and localized beach erosion.
info.instruction: Inexperienced swimmers should remain out of the water due to dangerous surf conditions and large amounts of debris in the coastal waters.

area.areaDesc: Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; Northern Monterey Bay; San Francisco; San Fransisco Peninsula Coast; Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast
